title: How to future-proof a 30-year-old computer
content:encoded:
Verge producer Will Poor attempts to fix up his family’s Mac Classic. The journey takes him to the finer points of soldering, message board flame wars, and a 2,000 year old Greek thought experiment.

Links: 

  • The Vintage Computer Federation
  • The “40th Anniversary Macintosh”
  • Follow Jason's tech adventures: @compu_85
